channel.title: Need majer help!
channel.description:
ok i need 2 things i need to know how to change the exp so its not so easy to lvl because ppl are leveling way to fast i want it to be like it so that they level by 2s
another thing is that i want it so that i can change how many ppl can be on like i think the highest ive gotten was 30 and then it started to lag bad and i another thing is that i need to figure out how to make it not so laggy
plz help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Need majer help!
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

If youâ€™re referring to getting xp when you use an object, you would get the object ID, and search for the ID in client.java until you find the case for it.
ex.

case 823: { //if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You attack the dummy."); //teleportToX = absX; //teleportToY = absY; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[3]), 3); actionTimer = 20; } break;

If it is when using items with each other such as crafting, then you would search for that skill area in client.java, and find the one you want to change based on item ID or note on it.
ex.

else if(itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 6571) { // onyx if(playerLevel[12] >= 75) { deleteItem(6571, getItemSlot(6571), 1); animation(483, absY, absX); startAnimation(885); addItem(6573, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 12); sendMessage("You cut the stone."); } else { sendMessage("You need a higher level to cut this rare gem."); } }

Read full topic
